nodes.name: 1Malaysia Development Berhad
nodes.description: Malaysian sovereign wealth fund at the center of the financial fraud scandal

nodes.name: Jho Low
nodes.description: Malaysian financier and primary architect of the 1MDB fraud

nodes.name: Low Taek Jho
nodes.description: Alternate name of Jho Low

nodes.name: Najib Razak
nodes.description: Former Prime Minister of Malaysia and chairman of 1MDB's advisory board implicated in the scandal

nodes.name: Goldman Sachs
nodes.description: Investment bank that arranged bond sales raising funds for 1MDB and involved in the scandal

nodes.name: Tim Leissner
nodes.description: Goldman Sachs Southeast Asia chairman who pleaded guilty to conspiracy related to 1MDB

nodes.name: Roger Ng
nodes.description: Goldman Sachs banker convicted for his role in the 1MDB scandal

nodes.name: Good Star Limited
nodes.description: Shell company registered in Seychelles used to receive over $1 billion from 1MDB bond proceeds

nodes.name: Seychelles
nodes.description: Location where Good Star Limited was registered

nodes.name: Equanimity
nodes.description: Luxury yacht purchased by Jho Low with stolen 1MDB funds

nodes.name: The Wolf of Wall Street
nodes.description: Hollywood film financed by Jho Low through Red Granite Pictures

nodes.name: Red Granite Pictures
nodes.description: Production company co-founded by Riza Aziz that financed The Wolf of Wall Street

nodes.name: Riza Aziz
nodes.description: Co-founder of Red Granite Pictures and stepson of Najib Razak

nodes.name: U.S. Department of Justice
nodes.description: U.S. federal agency that launched kleptocracy case against 1MDB fraud

nodes.name: Swiss authorities
nodes.description: Authorities who opened criminal proceedings and froze accounts linked to 1MDB

nodes.name: Monetary Authority of Singapore
nodes.description: Singapore financial regulator that closed banks for breaches related to 1MDB

nodes.name: BSI Bank
nodes.description: Singapore bank closed for anti-money laundering breaches related to 1MDB

nodes.name: Falcon Private Bank
nodes.description: Singapore bank closed for anti-money laundering breaches related to 1MDB

nodes.name: Mahathir Mohamad
nodes.description: Malaysian Prime Minister who reopened investigations into 1MDB after 2018 election

nodes.name: AmBank
nodes.description: Malaysian bank fined for failing to report suspicious transactions involving Najib Razak

nodes.name: Standard Chartered
nodes.description: Financial institution scrutinized for processing 1MDB-related transactions

nodes.name: Deutsche Bank
nodes.description: Financial institution scrutinized for processing 1MDB-related transactions

nodes.name: International Petroleum Investment Company
nodes.description: Abu Dhabi sovereign wealth fund involved in bond guarantees and settlement with Malaysia

nodes.name: Malaysia
nodes.description: Country whose sovereign wealth fund 1MDB was looted and whose government is involved in investigations

nodes.name: Saudi royal family
nodes.description: Alleged source of political donations to Najib Razak

nodes.name: Beverly Hills
nodes.description: Location where Jho Low purchased luxury real estate

nodes.name: New York
nodes.description: Location where Jho Low purchased luxury real estate

nodes.name: London
nodes.description: Location where Jho Low purchased luxury real estate
